data.title: Wake Forest University
data.meta_description: Dillon AryehDistance - Career Records Wake Forest Top-10 Marks No. 5 - 800m (Outdoor) - 1:48.76 Collegiate PR 800m (Outdoor) - 1:48.76 Mile (Indoor) - 4:17.0...
data.text:
Career Records

Wake Forest Top-10 Marks

No. 5 - 800m (Outdoor) - 1:48.76

Collegiate PR

800m (Outdoor) - 1:48.76

Mile (Indoor) - 4:17.02

1000m (Indoor) - 2:24.75

2023 (Graduate Student)

Outdoor: Opened up his outdoor season with a third place finish in the 800m with a 1:51.14 at the Wake Forest Invitational (April 6-8)... At the Charlotte Invitational, he finished in fifth place with a time of 1:52.98 in the 800m (April 28-29)... Competed in the 800m and 4x400 at the 2023 ACC Outdoor Track & Field Championships (May 11-13)... Placed 10th in the 800m with a 1:48.76 at the ACC Outdoor Track & Field Championships… Competed in the 800m at the NCAA East Preliminary Round (May 25-27).

Indoor: Did not compete in any events during the indoor season.

Senior (2021-22)

Outdoor Track: Participated in all seven outdoor meets … Clocked a personal-best time of 4:04.33 in the 1500 meter run and finished four at the Lafayette Open... Took home first place and recorded a PR in the 400-meter run at the UB Spring Opener ...placed eighth in the 800 meter run at the Patriot League Outdoor Championship.

Indoor Track: Competed in all six indoor meets … Took home first place in both the 1000-meter run and the 4x400 meter relay at the Colgate Class of '32 Invite ...Placed seventh in the 800-meter run at the Patriot League Indoor Championship.

Junior (2020-21)

Outdoor Track: Ran at three outdoor meets … Placed fourth in the 800-meter at the 2021 Lafayette Open … Finished 11th in the 800-meter at the Patriot League Outdoor Championships.

Indoor Track: Appeared in one indoor meet for the Raiders … Won the 800-meter with a time of 1:58.41 at the Patriot League Pod Meet.

Sophomore (2019-20)

Indoor Track: Appeared in 10 meets ... Won four events individually ... Contributed to two Distance Medley Relay wins ... Registered a PR in the 1000 Meter Run at the Kane Invitational with a time of 2:34.98.

Freshman (2018-19)

Outdoor Track: Participated in six meets ... Won the 400 Meter Dash at the Hamilton Mid-Week with a season-best time of 51.55 ... Capped his season with a 22nd place finish in the 800 Meter Run at the Patriot League Championships with a season-best time of 1:56.53.

Indoor Track: Competed in six meets ... Won the 1000 Meter Run at the Blue and Orange Invite with a season-best time of 2:35.29 ... Set the school Freshman Record for the 800 meters in 1:56.61 at the BU Last Chance Invite... Finished his year with a season-best time of 1:05.88 in the 500 Meter Dash at the Patriot League Championships.

Before Colgate

Graduated from Fox Lane High School in 2018…Lettered in cross country and track and field…Member of the Chess and Film clubs.

Honors: Was named an all-league runners four years in a row ... twice named all-county ... Was team captain his senior season.

Personal

Born: Full name is Dillon Hunter Aryeh…Born in New York, N.Y.

Family: Son of Sy and Julia Aryeh…Has one brother and one sister.
